item.title: EP 34 - Watcher In The Woods
item.itunes:title: Watcher In The Woods
item.description:
Today we postpone the apocalypse and go to camp!

Patreon
https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

MERCH STORE!!!
https://tinyurl.com/y8zam4o2

It's another blood moon so it's another round of "The Sky Is Falling, The World Is Ending!"  But is it really? How many times do we have to read headlines explaining that the end is nigh?

And then we dive into the deep end of the pool to examine the racist rantings of one man who wants to end the tyranny of "Jewish Swim Lessons."

Links:

APOCALYPSE THEN What’s the blood moon prophecy, what are the end time theories and when did the first total lunar eclipse in the tetrad happen?

https://www.thesun.co.uk/tech/5407634/blood-moon-prophecy-end-time-total-lunar-eclipse-tetrad/

End of world: Longest Blood Moon of century to spark apocalypse next week

https://www.deccanchronicle.com/lifestyle/viral-and-trending/230718/end-of-world-longest-blood-moon-of-century-to-spark-apocalypse-next-w.html

Blood Moon Prophecy

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Blood_moon_prophecy

Man spends Life Saving Promoting Harold Camping May21 End of the world

http://haroldcamping-21.blogspot.com/2011/05/man-spends-life-saving-promoting-harold.html

Did Jesus Predict the End and Get It Wrong?

http://biblestudyforcatholics.com/jesus-predict-end-get-wrong/

Mayan apocalypse: Argentina closes mountain over mass suicide risk

https://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/worldnews/southamerica/argentina/9756327/Mayan-apocalypse-Argentina-closes-mountain-over-mass-suicide-risk.html

Iranian President Linked to Black Magic, Summoning Genies

https://abcnews.go.com/International/iranian-president-ahmadinejad-allies-charged-black-magic-summoning/story?id=13561870

Jewish Swim Lessons

https://archive.4plebs.org/pol/thread/105611714/

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

------------------------------------------------

Logo Art By Ash Black
Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"
Closing Song: "Bella Royale"
Music By Dr. Huxxxtable
Hood River

http://www.DeadRabbit.com

Email: DeadRabbitRadio@gmail.com

Twitter: @DeadRabbitRadio

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/DeadRabbitRadio

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.

All Contents Of This Podcast Copyright Jason Carpenter 2018 - 2020
